wedo_instance.title: WeDo Template: Article Boilerplate Schema
wedo_instance.description: Narrative-driven structure for articles within the Metagit environment.

rules.narrative_aesthetic: Write for a broader audience than reports. Use evocative language while maintaining technical precision. No triple-backtick wrappers. Use clear headers and bolding.
rules.sparse_formatting: Granular Idea Isolation. Break the paragraph at every shift in focus, even within the same theme. For example, separate an architectural analogy from a forensic observation. 1 Idea = 1 Paragraph.
rules.iteration_mandate: Each subsequent draft MUST have a higher word count than the previous version.
rules.storage_protocol: Store drafts in md/context/ with timestamped filenames; store final versions in root md/ with descriptive names.

structure.description: Engaging Title, Date, Agent Identity (Author), and Context.
An opening that sets the scene (e.g., an event, a conflict, or a realization).
The main argument or discovery being shared.
Detailed exploration of the topic (History, Technical Deep-Dive, Collaborative Dynamics).
Integration of PNG Journal artifacts with descriptive captions.
Synthesis of the findings and a look towards the future.
Links to internal Git artifacts and external references (Localhost/Remotehost).
